df-ufil
blocks.content: Define the set of ultrafilters on a set. An ultrafilter is a filter that gives a definite result for every subset. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 30-Nov-2009.)

blocks.name: df-ufl
blocks.content: Define the class of base sets for which the ultrafilter lemma ~ filssufil holds. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: isufil
blocks.content: The property of being an ultrafilter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 30-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isufil(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  elmptrab2(hs1, hs0, c0, cufil, c1, cfv(cfil, c1), cfv(cfil, cv(hs1)), cdm(cfil), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0))), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs1)), wo(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  df-ufil(hs1, hs0, s0)
  raleqbidv(s0, cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wo(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(c1)))
  pweq(cv(hs1), c1)
  orbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  sylan(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)), wceq(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cdif(c1, cv(s0))))
  difeq1(cv(hs1), c1, cv(s0))
  eleq12(cdif(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cv(hs0), c0)
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, cfil)
  fvex(cfil, cv(hs1))
  elfvdm(c0, cfil, c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cfil, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(cfil))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfil, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfil, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(cfil))
  diff.hs1.w(wral(s0, cpw(c1), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, cpw(c1), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isufil(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ s0)‚àà c0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  elmptrab2(hs1, hs0, c0, cufil, c1, (Fil ` c1), (Fil ` hs1), dom(Fil), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ s0)‚àà c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(hs1),(s0 ‚àà hs0 ‚à®(hs1 \ s0)‚àà hs0)))
  df-ufil(hs1, hs0, s0)
  raleqbidv(s0, P(hs1), P(c1), (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs0 = c0), (s0 ‚àà hs0 ‚à®(hs1 \ s0)‚àà hs0), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ s0)‚àà c0))
  adantr(hs1 = c1, hs0 = c0, P(hs1)= P(c1))
  pweq(hs1, c1)
  orbi12d((hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs0 = c0), s0 ‚àà hs0, (hs1 \ s0)‚àà hs0, s0 ‚àà c0, (c1 \ s0)‚àà c0)
  adantl(hs1 = c1, hs0 = c0, (s0 ‚àà hs0 ‚Üî s0 ‚àà c0))
  eleq2(hs0, c0, s0)
  sylan(hs1 = c1, hs0 = c0, ((hs1 \ s0)‚àà hs0 ‚Üî(c1 \ s0)‚àà c0), (hs1 \ s0)=(c1 \ s0))
  difeq1(hs1, c1, s0)
  eleq12((hs1 \ s0), (c1 \ s0), hs0, c0)
  fveq2(hs1, c1, cfil)
  fvex(cfil, hs1)
  elfvdm(c0, cfil, c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((Fil ` c1))
  diff.hs1.c(dom(Fil))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Fil ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((Fil ` hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(dom(Fil))
  diff.hs1.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ s0)‚àà c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ s0)‚àà c0)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs1 = c1, hs0 = c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ufilfil
blocks.content: An ultrafilter is a filter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: ufilss
blocks.content: For any subset of the base set of an ultrafilter, either the set is in the ultrafilter or the complement is. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufilss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
  sylbird(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)), wcel(c2, cpw(c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(cufil)))
  elfvdm(c0, cufil, c1)
  elpw2g(c1, cdm(cufil), c2)
  simplbiim(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wi(wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  isufil(hs0, c0, c1)
  rspccv(hs0, cpw(c1), c2, wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0)), wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  eleq1d(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0, cdif(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  difeq2(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ufilss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0))
} = {
  imp(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0))
  sylbird(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0), c2 ‚àà P(c1))
  syl(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), (c2 ‚àà P(c1)‚Üî c2 ‚äÜ c1), c1 ‚àà dom(UFil))
  elfvdm(c0, cufil, c1)
  elpw2g(c1, dom(UFil), c2)
  simplbiim(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), (c2 ‚àà P(c1)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0)), c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c1),(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0)))
  isufil(hs0, c0, c1)
  rspccv(hs0, P(c1), c2, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0), (c2 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0))
  orbi12d(hs0 = c2, hs0 ‚àà c0, (c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà c0, (c1 \ c2)‚àà c0)
  eleq1(hs0, c2, c0)
  eleq1d((c1 \ hs0), c0, (c1 \ c2), hs0 = c2)
  difeq2(hs0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(P(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0))
}

blocks.name: ufilb
blocks.content: The complement is in an ultrafilter iff the set is not. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufilb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wn(wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wn(wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0))
  ord(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0))
  ufilss(c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0), wn(wcel(c2, c0))))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0), wn(wcel(c2, c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filfbas(c0, c1)
  con2d(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0), wcel(c2, c0))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wn(wcel(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
  fbncp(c0, c1, c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ufilb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(¬¨ c2 ‚àà c0 ‚Üî(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0))
} = {
  impbid((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), ¬¨ c2 ‚àà c0, (c1 \ c2)‚àà c0)
  ord((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), c2 ‚àà c0, (c1 \ c2)‚àà c0)
  ufilss(c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, ((c1 \ c2)‚àà c0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c2 ‚àà c0))
  3syl(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ((c1 \ c2)‚àà c0 ‚Üí ¬¨ c2 ‚àà c0), c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filfbas(c0, c1)
  con2d(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), (c1 \ c2)‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà c0)
  ex(c0 ‚àà(fBas ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, ¬¨(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0)
  fbncp(c0, c1, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: ufilmax
blocks.content: Any filter finer than an ultrafilter is actually equal to it. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufilmax(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wceq(c0, c2))
} = {
  eqssd(c0, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2))
  ssrdv(hs0, c2, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)))
  mpdd(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ex(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  filelss(c2, c1, cv(hs0))
  com23(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  con4d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sylbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0))
  3ad2antl1(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  ufilb(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  syld(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2))
  sseld(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0, c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  con2d(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl(wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  filfbas(c2, c1)
  ex(wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wn(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  fbncp(c2, c1, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ufilmax(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí c0 = c2)
} = {
  eqssd(c0, c2, (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2))
  simp3(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c0 ‚äÜ c2)
  ssrdv(hs0, c2, c0, (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2))
  mpdd((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2), hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚äÜ c1)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c0 ‚äÜ c2, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚äÜ c1))
  ex(c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ c1)
  filelss(c2, c1, hs0)
  com23((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2), hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚äÜ c1, hs0 ‚àà c0)
  ex((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2), hs0 ‚äÜ c1, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0))
  con4d(((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2)‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1), hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c0)
  sylbid(((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2)‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1), ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c2, (c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0)
  3ad2antl1(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c0 ‚äÜ c2, hs0 ‚äÜ c1, (¬¨ hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üî(c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0))
  ufilb(c0, c1, hs0)

blocks.name: ufprim
blocks.content: An ultrafilter is a prime filter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufprim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wb(wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(cun(c2, c3), c0)))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wo(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(cun(c2, c3), c0))
  jaod(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(cun(c2, c3), c0))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cun(c2, c3), c0))

thm ufprim(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí((c2 ‚àà c0 ‚à® c3 ‚àà c0)‚Üî(c2 ‚ãÉ c3)‚àà c0))

  adantr((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))

  adantr((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), c3 ‚àà c0, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  simpr((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), c3 ‚àà c0)

  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(cufil, c2)), wcel(c2, c0)))

  elpwi(cv(hs0), c2)
  mpd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c2)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c2)), wcel(cdif(c2, cv(hs0)), co(c0, crest, c2))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0)))

  simpll(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wss(cv(hs0), c2))
  sstrd(cv(hs0), c1, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c2)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wss(cv(hs0), c2))
  ufilss(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  orim12d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c2)), wcel(cdif(c2, cv(hs0)), co(c0, crest, c2)))

  expr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cdif(c2, cv(hs0)), co(c0, crest, c2)))
  eqeltrrd(cdif(c2, cv(hs0)), co(c0, crest, c2), cin(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  syl5eq(cin(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2), cdif(c2, cv(hs0)), cdif(cin(c1, c2), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  indif1(c1, cv(hs0), c2)
  difeq1d(cin(c1, c2), cv(hs0), c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  sylib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0))), wceq(cin(c1, c2), c2), wss(c2, c1))

  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0))), wcel(cin(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2), co(c0, crest, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0))

thm trufil(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí((c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(UFil ` c2)‚Üî c2 ‚àà c0))
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(UFil ` c2), c2 ‚àà c0, ¬¨(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0)
  impbid((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(UFil ` c2), ¬¨(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0)
  syl5ib((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(UFil ` c2), ¬¨(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0, (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(Fil ` c2))
  ufilfil((c0[|`t]c2), c2)
  syl6ibr((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), ¬¨(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0, (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(UFil ` c2), ((c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(Fil ` c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c2),(hs0 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2)‚à®(c2 \ hs0)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2)))))
  jctird((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), ¬¨(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0, (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(Fil ` c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c2),(hs0 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2)‚à®(c2 \ hs0)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2))))
  biimprd((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), ¬¨(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0, (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(Fil ` c2))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, ((c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(Fil ` c2)‚Üî ¬¨(c1 \ c2)‚àà c0), c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  trfil3(c0, c1, c2)
  ralrimiva(hs0, P(c2), (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), (hs0 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2)‚à®(c2 \ hs0)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2)))
  sylan2((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), hs0 ‚àà P(c2), (hs0 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2)‚à®(c2 \ hs0)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2)), hs0 ‚äÜ c2)
  elpwi(hs0, c2)
  mpd(((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c2), (hs0 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2)‚à®(c2 \ hs0)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2)), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0))
  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c2), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚à®(c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0), c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), hs0 ‚äÜ c1)
  simpll(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, hs0 ‚äÜ c2)
  sstrd(hs0, c1, c2, ((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c2))
  simplr(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, hs0 ‚äÜ c2)
  ufilss(c0, c1, hs0)
  orim12d(((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c2), hs0 ‚àà c0, (c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2), (c2 \ hs0)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2))
  sylibd(((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c2), hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2))
  adantr((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), hs0 ‚äÜ c2, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2)))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2)), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  3expia(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚àà ùïå, hs0 ‚àà c0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2))
  elrestr(c0, (UFil ` c1), c2, universe, hs0)
  eleq1d((hs0 ‚ãÇ c2), (c0[|`t]c2), hs0, ((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c2))
  sylib(((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c2), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)= hs0, hs0 ‚äÜ c2)
  simpr((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), hs0 ‚äÜ c2)
  df-ss(hs0, c2)
  expr((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), hs0 ‚äÜ c2, (c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0, (c2 \ hs0)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2))
  eqeltrrd((c2 \ hs0), (c0[|`t]c2), ((c1 \ hs0)‚ãÇ c2), ((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß(c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0)))
  syl5eq(((c1 \ hs0)‚ãÇ c2), (c2 \ hs0), ((c1 ‚ãÇ c2)\ hs0), ((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß(c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0)))
  indif1(c1, hs0, c2)
  difeq1d((c1 ‚ãÇ c2), hs0, c2, ((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß(c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0)))
  sylib(((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß(c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0)), (c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= c2, c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  simplr(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, (hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß(c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0))
  sseqin2(c2, c1)
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß(c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0)), ((c1 \ hs0)‚ãÇ c2)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2), c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚àà ùïå, (c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0)
  simpll(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, (hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß(c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0))
  adantr((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), (hs0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß(c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl2anr(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚äÜ c1, c1 ‚àà dom(UFil))
  id(c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  elfvdm(c0, cufil, c1)
  ssexg(c2, c1, dom(UFil))
  simprr((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), hs0 ‚äÜ c2, (c1 \ hs0)‚àà c0)
  elrestr(c0, (UFil ` c1), c2, universe, (c1 \ hs0))
  isufil(hs0, (c0[|`t]c2), c2)

blocks.name: filssufilg
blocks.content: A filter is contained in some ultrafilter. This version of ~ filssufil contains the choice as a hypothesis (in the assumption that ` ~P ~P X ` is well-orderable). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cpw(cpw(c1)), cdm(ccrd))), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c1), wss(c0, cv(s0))), wrex(s0, crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1))), wral(hs0, crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wpss(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))

  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cpw(c1))), wss(cv(hs1), cpw(c1)))
  filsspw(cv(hs1), c1)

  ssnum(cpw(cpw(c1)), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cpw(cpw(c1)), cdm(ccrd)), wne(crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1))), emptycls))

  jctr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(c0, c0))
  ssid(c0)
  elrab(hs1, c0, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)), wss(c0, c0))
  sseq2(cv(hs1), c0, c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cpw(cpw(c1)), cdm(ccrd)), wal(hs2, wi(w3a(wss(cv(hs2), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))), wne(cv(hs2), emptycls), wor(crpss, cv(hs2))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs2)), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))))))
  alrimiv(hs2, wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wi(w3a(wss(cv(hs2), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))), wne(cv(hs2), emptycls), wor(crpss, cv(hs2))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs2)), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1))))))

  elrabd(hs1, cuni(cv(hs2)), cfv(cfil, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), w3a(wss(cv(hs2), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))), wne(cv(hs2), emptycls), wor(crpss, cv(hs2)))), wss(c0, cv(hs1)), wss(c0, cuni(cv(hs2))))

  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), w3a(wss(cv(hs2), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))), wne(cv(hs2), emptycls), wor(crpss, cv(hs2)))), wss(cv(hs2), cfv(cfil, c1)), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wss(c0, cv(hs1))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), w3a(wss(cv(hs2), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))), wne(cv(hs2), emptycls), wor(crpss, cv(hs2)))), wa(wss(cv(hs2), cfv(cfil, c1)), wral(hs1, cv(hs2), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))), wss(cv(hs2), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))))

  simpr3(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(cv(hs2), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))), wne(cv(hs2), emptycls), wor(crpss, cv(hs2)))
  ralrimivva(hs1, hs0, cv(hs2), cv(hs2), wor(crpss, cv(hs2)), wcel(cun(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))
  sorpssun(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  filuni(hs1, hs0, cv(hs2), c1)
  sylc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), w3a(wss(cv(hs2), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))), wne(cv(hs2), emptycls), wor(crpss, cv(hs2)))), wss(c0, cuni(cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs2), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))), wne(cv(hs2), emptycls))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(cv(hs2), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))), wne(cv(hs2), emptycls), wor(crpss, cv(hs2)))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(cv(hs2), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))), wne(cv(hs2), emptycls), wor(crpss, cv(hs2)))
  syl5bi(wss(cv(hs2), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))), wne(cv(hs2), emptycls), wss(c0, cuni(cv(hs2))), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  n0(hs0, cv(hs2))
  exlimdv(hs0, wss(cv(hs2), crab(hs1, cfv(cfil, c1), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wss(c0, cuni(cv(hs2))))

blocks.name: filssufil
blocks.content: A filter is contained in some ultrafilter. (Requires the Axiom of Choice, via ~ numth3 .) (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 2-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: isufl
blocks.content: Define the (strong) ultrafilter lemma, parameterized over base sets. A set ` X ` satisfies the ultrafilter lemma if every filter on ` X ` is a subset of some ultrafilter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isufl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {

} = {

  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cufil)
  df-ufl(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, cfv(cfil, c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

blocks.content: Property of a set that satisfies the ultrafilter lemma. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

thm ufli(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c0))), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, cufl), wcel(c1, cfv(cfil, c0)), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))), wral(hs0, cfv(cfil, c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cufl), wral(hs0, cfv(cfil, c0), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  isufl(hs0, s0, c0, cufl)
  rspccva(hs0, cfv(cfil, c0), c1, wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))))
  rexbidv(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(c1, cv(s0)))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfil, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(UFil ` c0), c1 ‚äÜ s0))

blocks.content: Consequence of ~ filssufilg : a set whose double powerset is well-orderable satisfies the ultrafilter lemma. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

thm numufl(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(c0, cufl))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(c0, cufl), wral(hs0, cfv(cfil, c0), wrex(hs1, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cfv(cfil, c0), wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)), wrex(hs1, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  ancoms(wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c0)), wrex(hs1, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  filssufilg(hs1, cv(hs0), c0)
  syl(wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)), wb(wcel(c0, cufl), wral(hs0, cfv(cfil, c0), wrex(hs1, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  sylibr(wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
  pwexr(cpw(c0), cdm(ccrd))
  pwexb(c0)
  isufl(hs0, hs1, c0, universe)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

}

blocks.name: ssufl

thm ssufl(class c0, class c1) {

  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfil, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfbas, c0)))
  fgcl(cv(hs0), c0)
  ufli(hs2, c0, co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cufil, c1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(co(cv(hs2), crest, c1), cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs2), crest, c1)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))), wcel(co(cv(hs2), crest, c1), cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c1, cv(hs2)))
  sseldd(c1, cv(hs2), cv(hs0), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))), wb(wcel(co(cv(hs2), crest, c1), cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c1, cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(c1, c0))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2))), wss(c1, c0))
  trufil(cv(hs2), c0, c1)
  eqsstr3d(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs2), crest, c1), co(cv(hs0), crest, c1), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), crest, c1), cv(hs0)), wcel(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)))
  ad2antlr(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2))), wcel(c1, cv(hs0)))
  filtop(cv(hs0), c1)

  sstrd(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cufil, c0)), wss(co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs2))), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfg, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfbas, c0)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfbas, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(c0, cufl))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  filfbas(cv(hs0), c1)
  sstrd(cv(hs0), cpw(c0), cpw(c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)))
  filsspw(cv(hs0), c1)
  sylib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfil, c1))), wss(cpw(c1), cpw(c0)), wss(c1, c0))

  sseq2(cv(hs1), co(cv(hs2), crest, c1), cv(hs0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cufl), wss(c1, c0)), wb(wcel(c1, cufl), wral(hs0, cfv(cfil, c1), wrex(hs1, cfv(cufil, c1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wcel(c1, universe))

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà UFL ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0)‚Üí c1 ‚àà UFL)
} = {

blocks.name: ufileu
blocks.content: If the ultrafilter containing a given filter is unique, the filter is an ultrafilter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 3-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: filufint
blocks.content: A filter is equal to the intersection of the ultrafilters containing it. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.content: Lemma for ~ fixufil and ~ uffixfr . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uffix(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wa(wcel(csn(csn(c2)), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wceq(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(csn(csn(c2)), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wceq(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2)))))
  eqrdv(hs0, crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)))
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, csn(csn(c2)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))
  anbi12d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, csn(csn(c2)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0)))
  selpw(hs0, c0)
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, csn(csn(c2)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  sylancr(wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, csn(csn(c2)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(csn(c2), csn(csn(c2))), wss(csn(c2), cv(hs0)))
  snid(csn(c2))
  snssi(c2, cv(hs0))
  rspcev(s0, csn(c2), csn(csn(c2)), wss(csn(c2), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  sseq1(cv(s0), csn(c2), cv(hs0))
  rexlimdva(s0, csn(csn(c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)))
  sylan9r(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(csn(c2))), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cint(csn(csn(c2))), cv(hs0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), csn(csn(c2))), wi(wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cint(csn(csn(c2))), cv(hs0))), wss(cint(csn(csn(c2))), cv(s0)))
  intss1(cv(s0), csn(csn(c2)))
  sstr2(cint(csn(csn(c2))), cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  syl5com(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wss(cint(csn(csn(c2))), cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, cint(csn(csn(c2)))))
  syl6eleqr(c2, cint(csn(csn(c2))), csn(c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, csn(c2)))
  snidg(c2, c0)
  intsn(csn(c2))
  snex(c2)
  ssel(cint(csn(csn(c2))), cv(hs0), c2)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  elrab(s0, cv(hs0), cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)))
  eleq2w(s0, hs0, c2)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2)))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, csn(csn(c2)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wcel(csn(csn(c2)), cfv(cfbas, c0)))
  syl2an23an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(csn(csn(c2)), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wss(csn(c2), c0), wne(csn(c2), emptycls), wcel(c0, c1))
  snssi(c2, c0)
  snnzg(c2, c0)
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0))
  snfbas(csn(c2), c0, c1)
  elfg(s0, csn(csn(c2)), c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, csn(c2))
  diff.wss.s(s0, csn(c2), cv(hs0))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
}

thm uffix(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)‚Üí({ { c2 } } ‚àà(fBas ` c0)‚àß { s0 ‚àà P(c0)| c2 ‚àà s0 } =(c0[filGen]{ { c2 } })))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  jca((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), { { c2 } } ‚àà(fBas ` c0), { s0 ‚àà P(c0)| c2 ‚àà s0 } =(c0[filGen]{ { c2 } }))
  eqrdv(hs0, { s0 ‚àà P(c0)| c2 ‚àà s0 }, (c0[filGen]{ { c2 } }), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  3bitr4d((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà P(c0)| c2 ‚àà s0 }, hs0 ‚àà(c0[filGen]{ { c2 } }), (hs0 ‚àà P(c0)‚àß c2 ‚àà hs0), (hs0 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà { { c2 } }, s0 ‚äÜ hs0)))
  anbi12d((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà P(c0), c2 ‚àà hs0, hs0 ‚äÜ c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà { { c2 } }, s0 ‚äÜ hs0))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), (hs0 ‚àà P(c0)‚Üî hs0 ‚äÜ c0))
  selpw(hs0, c0)
  impbid2((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), c2 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà { { c2 } }, s0 ‚äÜ hs0))
  sylancr(c2 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà { { c2 } }, s0 ‚äÜ hs0), { c2 } ‚àà { { c2 } }, { c2 } ‚äÜ hs0)
  snid({ c2 })
  snssi(c2, hs0)
  rspcev(s0, { c2 }, { { c2 } }, { c2 } ‚äÜ hs0, s0 ‚äÜ hs0)
  sseq1(s0, { c2 }, hs0)
  rexlimdva(s0, { { c2 } }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), s0 ‚äÜ hs0, c2 ‚àà hs0)
  sylan9r((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), s0 ‚àà { { c2 } }, s0 ‚äÜ hs0, c2 ‚àà hs0, ‚ãÇ { { c2 } } ‚äÜ hs0)
  syl(s0 ‚àà { { c2 } }, (s0 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚Üí ‚ãÇ { { c2 } } ‚äÜ hs0), ‚ãÇ { { c2 } } ‚äÜ s0)
  intss1(s0, { { c2 } })
  sstr2(‚ãÇ { { c2 } }, s0, hs0)
  syl5com((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), ‚ãÇ { { c2 } } ‚äÜ hs0, c2 ‚àà hs0, c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ { { c2 } })
  syl6eleqr(c2, ‚ãÇ { { c2 } }, { c2 }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà { c2 })
  snidg(c2, c0)
  intsn({ c2 })
  snex(c2)
  ssel(‚ãÇ { { c2 } }, hs0, c2)
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), (hs0 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà P(c0)| c2 ‚àà s0 } ‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà P(c0)‚àß c2 ‚àà hs0)))
  elrab(s0, hs0, P(c0), c2 ‚àà s0, c2 ‚àà hs0)
  eleq2w(s0, hs0, c2)
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), (hs0 ‚àà(c0[filGen]{ { c2 } })‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà { { c2 } }, s0 ‚äÜ hs0))), { { c2 } } ‚àà(fBas ` c0))
  syl2an23an(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c0, { { c2 } } ‚àà(fBas ` c0), { c2 } ‚äÜ c0, { c2 } ‚â† ‚àÖ, c0 ‚àà c1)
  snssi(c2, c0)
  snnzg(c2, c0)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c0)
  snfbas({ c2 }, c0, c1)
  elfg(s0, { { c2 } }, c0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà P(c0)| c2 ‚àà s0 })
  diff.hs0.c((c0[filGen]{ { c2 } }))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, { c2 })
  diff.wss.s(s0, { c2 }, hs0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)

  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)

blocks.name: fixufil
blocks.content: The condition describing a fixed ultrafilter always produces an ultrafilter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 9-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fixufil(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), cfv(cufil, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), cfv(cufil, c0)), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), cfv(cfil, c0)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))))))
  eqeltrd(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), cfv(cfil, c0), co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2)))), wcel(csn(csn(c2)), cfv(cfbas, c0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2))), cfv(cfil, c0)), wcel(csn(csn(c2)), cfv(cfbas, c0)))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(csn(csn(c2)), cfv(cfbas, c0)), wceq(crab(s0, cpw(c0), wcel(c2, cv(s0))), co(c0, cfg, csn(csn(c2)))))
  uffix(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  fgcl(csn(csn(c2)), c0)

blocks.name: uffixfr
blocks.content: An ultrafilter is either fixed or free. A fixed ultrafilter is called principal (generated by a single element ` A ` ), and a free ultrafilter is called nonprincipal (having empty intersection). Note that examples of free ultrafilters cannot be defined in ZFC without some form of global choice. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 4-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)

  intssuni(c0)
  syl(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚ãÉ c0 = c1, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  filunibas(c0, c1)
  uffix(s0, c1, c0, c2)
  fgcl({ { c2 } }, c1)
  sylanbrc((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), c0 ‚äÜ { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 }, c0 ‚äÜ P(c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà s0))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), c0 ‚äÜ P(c1), c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  filsspw(c0, c1)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà s0))
  ibi(c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà s0))
  elintg(s0, c2, ‚ãÇ c0, c0)
  ufilmax(c0, c1, { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 })
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c0 = { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 }), c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà s0))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c0 = { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 }), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà s0), c0 ‚äÜ { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 })
  adantl(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c0 = { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 }, c0 ‚äÜ { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 })
  eqimss(c0, { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 })
  simprbi(c0 ‚äÜ { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 }, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà s0), c0 ‚äÜ P(c1))
  ssrab(s0, c0, P(c1), c2 ‚àà s0)
  3syl((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c0 = { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 }), (c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà s0)), c1 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 }, c2 ‚àà c1)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c0 = { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 }, c1 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 }, c1 ‚àà c0)
  syl(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c1 ‚àà c0, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filtop(c0, c1)
  biimpac(c1 ‚àà c0, c0 = { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 }, c1 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 })
  eleq2(c0, { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 }, c1)
  simprbi(c1 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà s0 }, c2 ‚àà c1, c1 ‚àà P(c1))
  elrab(s0, c1, P(c1), c2 ‚àà s0, c2 ‚àà c1)
  eleq2(s0, c1, c2)
  elintg(s0, c2, c1, c0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: uffix2
blocks.content: A classification of fixed ultrafilters. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uffix2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wb(wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cint(c0))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  exbidv(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cint(c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cint(c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cint(c0))))
  pm4.71rd(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cint(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  sseld(cv(s0), cint(c0), c1, wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  sseqtrd(cint(c0), c1, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cint(c0), cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  filn0(c0, c1)
  intssuni(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(cuni(c0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filunibas(c0, c1)
  anbi2d(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cint(c0)), wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  uffixfr(s1, c0, c1, cv(s0))
  n0(s0, cint(c0))
  df-rex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cufil, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cufil, c1)
  diff.cufil.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cint.s(s0, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uffix2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚Üí(‚ãÇ c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 = { s1 ‚àà P(c1)| s0 ‚àà s1 })))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚ãÇ c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 = { s1 ‚àà P(c1)| s0 ‚àà s1 }), ‚àÉ(s0, s0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 = { s1 ‚àà P(c1)| s0 ‚àà s1 })))
  exbidv(s0, c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), s0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 = { s1 ‚àà P(c1)| s0 ‚àà s1 }))
  bitrd(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), s0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 = { s1 ‚àà P(c1)| s0 ‚àà s1 }), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0))
  pm4.71rd(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), s0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, s0 ‚àà c1)
  sseld(s0, ‚ãÇ c0, c1, c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1))
  sseqtrd(‚ãÇ c0, c1, ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1))
  3syl(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚ãÇ c0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  filn0(c0, c1)
  intssuni(c0)
  syl(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚ãÉ c0 = c1, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filunibas(c0, c1)
  anbi2d(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), s0 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, c0 = { s1 ‚àà P(c1)| s0 ‚àà s1 })
  uffixfr(s1, c0, c1, s0)
  n0(s0, ‚ãÇ c0)
  df-rex(s0, c1, c0 = { s1 ‚àà P(c1)| s0 ‚àà s1 })
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (UFil ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cufil, c1)
  diff.cufil.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cint.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: uffixsn
blocks.content: The singleton of the generator of a fixed ultrafilter is in the filter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uffixsn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0))), wcel(csn(c2), c0))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(csn(c2), c0, crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wcel(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0))))
  elrabd(hs0, csn(c2), cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0))), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wcel(c2, csn(c2)))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), csn(c2), c2)
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0))), wcel(csn(c2), cpw(c1)), wss(csn(c2), c1))
  snssd(c2, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0))))
  sselda(c2, cint(c0), c1, wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  sseqtrd(cint(c0), c1, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cint(c0), cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  filn0(c0, c1)
  intssuni(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(cuni(c0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filunibas(c0, c1)
  elpw(csn(c2), c1)
  snex(c2)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0)), wcel(c2, csn(c2)))
  snidg(c2, cint(c0))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, cint(c0)), wceq(c0, crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  uffixfr(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c2, csn(c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uffixsn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0)‚Üí { c2 } ‚àà c0)
} = {
  eleqtrrd({ c2 }, c0, { hs0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà hs0 }, (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0))
  elrabd(hs0, { c2 }, P(c1), (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), c2 ‚àà hs0, c2 ‚àà { c2 })
  eleq2(hs0, { c2 }, c2)
  sylibr((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), { c2 } ‚àà P(c1), { c2 } ‚äÜ c1)
  snssd(c2, c1, (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0))
  sselda(c2, ‚ãÇ c0, c1, c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1))
  sseqtrd(‚ãÇ c0, c1, ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1))
  3syl(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚ãÇ c0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  filn0(c0, c1)
  intssuni(c0)
  syl(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚ãÉ c0 = c1, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filunibas(c0, c1)
  elpw({ c2 }, c1)
  snex(c2)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, c2 ‚àà { c2 })
  snidg(c2, ‚ãÇ c0)
  biimpa(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, c0 = { hs0 ‚àà P(c1)| c2 ‚àà hs0 })
  uffixfr(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c({ c2 })
  diff.hs0.c(P(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(c2 ‚àà { c2 })
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: ufildom1
blocks.content: An ultrafilter is generated by at most one element (because free ultrafilters have no generators and fixed ultrafilters have exactly one). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufildom1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wbr(cint(c0), cdom, c1o))
} = {
  pm2.61ne(cint(c0), emptycls, wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wbr(cint(c0), cdom, c1o), wbr(emptycls, cdom, c1o))
  breq1(cint(c0), emptycls, cdom, c1o)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wne(cint(c0), emptycls)), wbr(cint(c0), cdom, c1o), wbr(cint(c0), cen, c1o))
  imp(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wbr(cint(c0), cen, c1o))
  3imtr4g(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wbr(cint(c0), cen, c1o), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wex(hs0, wceq(cint(c0), csn(cv(hs0)))))
  eximdv(hs0, wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)), wceq(cint(c0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)), wceq(cint(c0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  eqssd(cint(c0), csn(cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wss(cint(c0), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))
  uffixsn(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  intss1(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)
  snssd(cv(hs0), cint(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)))
  n0(hs0, cint(c0))
  en1(hs0, cint(c0))
  endom(cint(c0), c1o)
  mp1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wbr(emptycls, cdom, c1o), wcel(c1o, con0))
  1on()
  0domg(c1o, con0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cint(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ufildom1(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚Üí ‚ãÇ c0[‚âº]1o)
} = {
  pm2.61ne(‚ãÇ c0, emptycls, c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚ãÇ c0[‚âº]1o, ‚àÖ[‚âº]1o)
  breq1(‚ãÇ c0, emptycls, cdom, c1o)

  imp(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚ãÇ c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚ãÇ c0[‚âÖ]1o)
  3imtr4g(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚ãÇ c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚ãÇ c0[‚âÖ]1o, ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), ‚àÉ(hs0, ‚ãÇ c0 = { hs0 }))
  eximdv(hs0, c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, ‚ãÇ c0 = { hs0 })
  ex(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, ‚ãÇ c0 = { hs0 })
  eqssd(‚ãÇ c0, { hs0 }, (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), ‚ãÇ c0 ‚äÜ { hs0 }, { hs0 } ‚àà c0)
  uffixsn(c0, c1, hs0)
  intss1({ hs0 }, c0)
  snssd(hs0, ‚ãÇ c0, (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0)
  n0(hs0, ‚ãÇ c0)
  en1(hs0, ‚ãÇ c0)
  endom(‚ãÇ c0, c1o)
  mp1i(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚àÖ[‚âº]1o, 1o ‚àà On)
  1on()
  0domg(c1o, con0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÇ c0)
}

blocks.name: uffinfix
blocks.content: An ultrafilter containing a finite element is fixed. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm uffinfix(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wne(cint(c0), emptycls))
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn), wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filfinnfr(c0, c1, c2)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cfn), wb(wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  uffix2(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uffinfix(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà Fin)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 = { s1 ‚àà P(c1)| s0 ‚àà s1 }))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà Fin), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 = { s1 ‚àà P(c1)| s0 ‚àà s1 }), ‚ãÇ c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  syl3an1(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà Fin, ‚ãÇ c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filfinnfr(c0, c1, c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà Fin, (‚ãÇ c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c0 = { s1 ‚àà P(c1)| s0 ‚àà s1 })))
  uffix2(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: cfinufil
blocks.content: An ultrafilter is free iff it contains the Fréchet filter ~ cfinfil as a subset. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jul-2008.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cfinufil(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wb(wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wss(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn)), c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wss(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn)), c0), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  impbid(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  ralrimdva(s0, cpw(c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c1)), wi(wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wss(cv(s0), c1))
  elpwi(cv(s0), c1)
  com23(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wi(wceq(cint(c0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  necon4bd(cint(c0), emptycls, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sylbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(cint(c0), emptycls), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wb(wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0)))
  ufilb(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0), wne(cint(c0), emptycls)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1)), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0), wne(cint(c0), emptycls))), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  com23(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0), wne(cint(c0), emptycls))
  3exp(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wne(cint(c0), emptycls))
  filfinnfr(c0, c1, cdif(c1, cv(s0)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cint(c0), emptycls))
  eq0rdv(hs0, cint(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))))
  pm2.01d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)))

  syld(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0))
  mpid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn))
  syl6eqel(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn, csn(cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wceq(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), csn(cv(hs0))), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), c1))
  dfss4(csn(cv(hs0)), c1)
  snfi(cv(hs0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wi(wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0))), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), cpw(c1)))
  mpbiri(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), cpw(c1)), wss(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c1))
  difss(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wb(wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), cpw(c1)), wss(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c1, c0))
  filtop(c0, c1)
  elpw2g(c1, c0, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))
  rspcv(s0, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0))
  eleq1d(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn, cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  difeq2(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c1)
  eleq1(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0)
  sylbird(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)), wb(wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0)), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), c1))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filelss(c0, c1, csn(cv(hs0)))
  ufilb(c0, c1, csn(cv(hs0)))
  pm2.24d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0))))
  uffixsn(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  rabss(s0, cpw(c1), c0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cufil, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cufil, c1)
  diff.cufil.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cint(c0), emptycls)
  diff.cint.s(s0, c0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cint(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wcel(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn), wcel(cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cdif(c1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), cfn)

blocks.pretty:
thm cfinufil(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚Üí(‚ãÇ c0 = ‚àÖ ‚Üî { s0 ‚àà P(c1)|(c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin } ‚äÜ c0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6bbr(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚ãÇ c0 = ‚àÖ, { s0 ‚àà P(c1)|(c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin } ‚äÜ c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)))
  impbid(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚ãÇ c0 = ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)))
  ralrimdva(s0, P(c1), c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚ãÇ c0 = ‚àÖ, ((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), s0 ‚àà P(c1), (‚ãÇ c0 = ‚àÖ ‚Üí((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)), s0 ‚äÜ c1)
  elpwi(s0, c1)
  com23((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß s0 ‚äÜ c1), ‚ãÇ c0 = ‚àÖ, (c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin, s0 ‚àà c0)
  ex((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß s0 ‚äÜ c1), (c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin, (‚ãÇ c0 = ‚àÖ ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))
  necon4bd(‚ãÇ c0, emptycls, ((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß s0 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß(c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin), s0 ‚àà c0)
  sylbid(((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß s0 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß(c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin), ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c0, ‚ãÇ c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, (c1 \ s0)‚àà c0)
  adantr((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß s0 ‚äÜ c1), (c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin, (¬¨ s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üî(c1 \ s0)‚àà c0))
  ufilb(c0, c1, s0)
  imp((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß s0 ‚äÜ c1), (c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin, ((c1 \ s0)‚àà c0 ‚Üí ‚ãÇ c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß s0 ‚äÜ c1), ((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí((c1 \ s0)‚àà c0 ‚Üí ‚ãÇ c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)), c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), s0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  com23(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), (c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin, (c1 \ s0)‚àà c0, ‚ãÇ c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  3exp(c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), (c1 \ s0)‚àà c0, (c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin, ‚ãÇ c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  filfinnfr(c0, c1, (c1 \ s0))
  ex(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)), ‚ãÇ c0 = ‚àÖ)
  eq0rdv(hs0, ‚ãÇ c0, (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))))
  pm2.01d((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0)
  impancom(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0)
  syld((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)), ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, (c1 \ { hs0 })‚àà c0)
  mpid((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0)), (c1 \ { hs0 })‚àà c0, (c1 \(c1 \ { hs0 }))‚àà Fin)
  syl6eqel((c1 \(c1 \ { hs0 })), cfn, { hs0 }, (c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0))
  sylib((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), (c1 \(c1 \ { hs0 }))= { hs0 }, { hs0 } ‚äÜ c1)
  dfss4({ hs0 }, c1)
  snfi(hs0)
  syl((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))‚Üí((c1 \(c1 \ { hs0 }))‚àà Fin ‚Üí(c1 \ { hs0 })‚àà c0)), (c1 \ { hs0 })‚àà P(c1))
  mpbiri((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), (c1 \ { hs0 })‚àà P(c1), (c1 \ { hs0 })‚äÜ c1)
  difss(c1, { hs0 })
  3syl((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), ((c1 \ { hs0 })‚àà P(c1)‚Üî(c1 \ { hs0 })‚äÜ c1), c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), c1 ‚àà c0)
  filtop(c0, c1)
  elpw2g(c1, c0, (c1 \ { hs0 }))
  rspcv(s0, (c1 \ { hs0 }), P(c1), ((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0), ((c1 \(c1 \ { hs0 }))‚àà Fin ‚Üí(c1 \ { hs0 })‚àà c0))
  imbi12d(s0 =(c1 \ { hs0 }), (c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin, s0 ‚àà c0, (c1 \(c1 \ { hs0 }))‚àà Fin, (c1 \ { hs0 })‚àà c0)
  eleq1d((c1 \ s0), cfn, (c1 \(c1 \ { hs0 })), s0 =(c1 \ { hs0 }))
  difeq2(s0, (c1 \ { hs0 }), c1)
  eleq1(s0, (c1 \ { hs0 }), c0)
  sylbird((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), (c1 \ { hs0 })‚àà c0, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c0)
  syldan(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, (¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c0 ‚Üî(c1 \ { hs0 })‚àà c0), { hs0 } ‚äÜ c1)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), { hs0 } ‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1), { hs0 } ‚àà c0)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1), hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0, c0 ‚àà(Fil ` c1))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filelss(c0, c1, { hs0 })
  ufilb(c0, c1, { hs0 })
  pm2.24d((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0), { hs0 } ‚àà c0, ¬¨ hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÇ c0)
  uffixsn(c0, c1, hs0)
  rabss(s0, P(c1), c0, (c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (UFil ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cufil, c1)
  diff.cufil.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, ‚ãÇ c0, emptycls)
  diff.cint.s(s0, c0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÇ c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà(UFil ` c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c1),((c1 \ s0)‚àà Fin ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, (c1 \(c1 \ { hs0 }))‚àà Fin, (c1 \ { hs0 })‚àà c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c1 \(c1 \ { hs0 })), cfn)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, (c1 \ { hs0 }))
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c1 \ { hs0 }), c0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, { hs0 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ufinffr
blocks.content: An infinite subset is contained in a free ultrafilter. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 6-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm ufinffr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(com, cdom, c2)), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cint(cv(s0)), emptycls))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(com, cdom, c2)), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cint(cv(s0)), emptycls))), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wcel(cdif(c2, cv(hs0)), cfn)), cv(s0))))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(com, cdom, c2)), wrex(s0, cfv(cufil, c0), wss(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wcel(cdif(c2, cv(hs0)), cfn)), cv(s0))), wcel(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wcel(cdif(c2, cv(hs0)), cfn)), cfv(cfil, c0)))
  syl3an3(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wbr(com, cdom, c2), wcel(crab(hs0, cpw(c0), wcel(cdif(c2, cv(hs0)), cfn)), cfv(cfil, c0)), wn(wcel(c2, cfn)))
  mtoi(wbr(com, cdom, c2), wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(com, cfn))
  ominf()
  expcom(wbr(com, cdom, c2), wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(com, cfn))
  domfi(c2, com)
  cfinfil(hs0, c0, c1, c2)

blocks.name: ufilen
blocks.content: Any infinite set has an ultrafilter on it whose elements are of the same cardinality as the set. Any such ultrafilter is necessarily free. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 7-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: ufildr
blocks.content: An ultrafilter gives rise to a connected door topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 6-Dec-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Aug-2015.)

thm ufildr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(cun(c2, cfv(ccld, c2)), cpw(c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cun(c2, cfv(ccld, c2)), cpw(c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c2, cfv(ccld, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2))), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  impbid(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2))), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  jaod(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl5ibr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c2)))
  elssuni(cv(hs0), c2)
  syl5ibr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c2)))
  cldss(cv(hs0), c2, cuni(c2))
  ex(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2))))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  ufilss(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  orim12d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2)))
  sseld(cv(hs0), c0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2))
  sseld(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wss(c0, c2))
  sseqtr4i(c0, c2, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)))
  ssun1(c0, csn(emptycls))
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2)), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cdif(cuni(c2), cv(hs0)), c2))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c2)), wcel(cdif(cuni(c2), cv(hs0)), c2)), wcel(c2, ctop), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c2)))
  syl5eqel(c2, ctop, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wcel(cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(cun(c0, csn(emptycls)), cconn))
  filconn(c0, c1)
  conntop(cun(c0, csn(emptycls)))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c2)))
  sseq2d(cv(hs0), c1, cuni(c2), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  iscld2(c2, cv(hs0), cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cdif(cuni(c2), cv(hs0)), c2)))

  difeq1d(c1, cv(hs0), cuni(c2), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  syl5reqr(c1, cuni(c2), cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)))
  eqtr2i(cuni(c0), cuni(c2), cuni(cun(c0, csn(emptycls))))
  unieqi(c2, cun(c0, csn(emptycls)))
  3eqtri(cuni(cun(c0, csn(emptycls))), cuni(c0), cun(cuni(c0), cuni(csn(emptycls))), cun(cuni(c0), emptycls))
  uniun(c0, csn(emptycls))
  uneq2i(cuni(c0), cuni(csn(emptycls)), emptycls)
  unisn(emptycls)
  0ex()
  un0(cuni(c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cufil, c1)), wceq(cuni(c0), c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)))
  ufilfil(c0, c1)
  filunibas(c0, c1)
  elun(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(ccld, c2))

blocks.name: fin1aufil
blocks.content: There are no definable free ultrafilters in ZFC. However, there are free ultrafilters in some choice-denying constructions. Here we show that given an amorphous set (a.k.a. a Ia-finite I-infinite set) ` X ` , the set of infinite subsets of ` X ` is a free ultrafilter on ` X ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-May-2015.)
